class.rdfs:comment: A comment on an item - for example, a comment on a blog post. The comment's content is expressed via the [[text]] property, and its topic via [[about]], properties shared with all CreativeWorks.
class.rdfs:label: Comment

schema:downvoteCount.rdfs:comment: The number of downvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.
schema:downvoteCount.rdfs:label: downvoteCount

schema:parentItem.rdfs:comment: The parent of a question, answer or item in general.
schema:parentItem.rdfs:label: parentItem

schema:upvoteCount.rdfs:comment: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.
schema:upvoteCount.rdfs:label: upvoteCount
